name: .DRWDOT
summary: Learn about .DRWDOT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a DRWDOT file in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks (multiplatform). To do so:
Make sure your DRWDOT file is saved in SolidWorks' templates directory.
In SolidWorks, select File â†’ New....
When the New SolidWorks Document window appears, select Advanced. Then, select the Templates tab.
Select and open your DRWDOT file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .drwdot file in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Premium 2022
images.caption: DRWDOT file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Premium 2022
